overview: Because Ayoub is greedy for Al-Zafarani's wealth, he agrees to marry his second daughter, Salwa, who is engaged to her colleague Ahmed. And because Salwa and Ahmed are stumbling in marriage due to their lack of income, they agree to Salwa’s marriage to the shopkeeper after he writes to her half of his wealth, provided that they kill him after the marriage.
title: للفقيد الرحمة
